simplifiedChinese.title: Be Reconciled!
simplifiedChinese.Question1: Why is Paul writing to Philemon?
simplifiedChinese.Question2: Who was Onesimus and how did Paul meet him?
simplifiedChinese.Question3: How did Paul expect the gospel to reshape the relationship between Philemon and Onesimus?
simplifiedChinese.Question4: Are there accepted relationships in your culture that the gospel would reshape? What would that look like?
